Articles.Content:
This is an idea I had, people would post on this thread describing a ship, and then they put out an offer to buy it, the buyer would then post, with a ship they built and trade it with the other person

when the agreement in finished both people give each other the craft files.

well, i'll start.. 

An SSTO Rocket

The problem is, guys, that there used to be a lot of activity like this on the forum, but oddly enough it caused no end of really bitter arguments that resulted in the moderators having to ban people to put an end to it all. It was so bad we had to make a forum rule against "roleplaying" in the sense that we no longer allow people to run pretend companies and perform rocket builds for them. Sorry to step on your fun.
